patterns: how much does a mercedes cost?
responses: Prices start around $45,000 and go up depending on model and options
Yes, we offer flexible financing options and competitive rates
Leasing is available on most models with low monthly payments
Yes, we accept trade-ins and offer competitive market values
Absolutely! We can schedule a test drive at your convenience
Our certified technicians provide top-tier Mercedes-Benz service
Mercedes recommends service every 10,000 miles or once a year
All new Mercedes vehicles include a 4-year/50,000-mile warranty
Our Certified Pre-Owned vehicles are fully inspected and warrantied
Mercedes vehicles feature advanced driver assistance like Active Brake Assist and Blind Spot Assist
Our interiors include MBUX, digital displays, ambient lighting, and premium materials
You can fully customize and factory-order your Mercedes-Benz
We are open Monday through Saturday from 9 AM to 7 PM
